scripts.type:check: tsc --noEmit && echo "✔ Finished tsc type check"
scripts.volar: yarn vue-tsc --noEmit --project ./tsconfig.vue-tsc.json && echo "✔ Finished Volar type check"

dependenciesComments.@testing-library/vue: v5 because this is compatible with Vue 2
dependenciesComments.@vue/test-utils: v1 because this is compatible with Vue 2
dependenciesComments.@vue/tsconfig: v0.1 because this is compatible with TypeScript 4.9
dependenciesComments.bootstrap: v4.6.1 because this recommended for bootstrap-vue. see: https://bootstrap-vue.org/docs
dependenciesComments.typescript: v4.9 because v5 breaks the auto-imports / wildcard exports in the package.json's we currently use. see: https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/53116
dependenciesComments.vue-i18n: v8 because this is compatible with Vue 2
dependenciesComments.vue-router: v3 because this is compatible with Vue 2
dependenciesComments.vue: v2 because we still have packages that are not compatible with Vue 3 such as vuex and bootstrap-vue
dependenciesComments.vuex: v3 because this is compatible with Vue 2
